metadata.description: Claims with paraphrased variations to test semantic robustness

variations.text: Oxygen is generated by the Amazon jungle
The tropical rainforest in the Amazon produces oxygen
It is known that the Amazon rainforest generates oxygen
Tooth decay is prevented by fluoride
Cavity formation can be reduced with fluoride
The application of fluoride helps prevent tooth decay
Health problems are caused by mobile phones
Cellular devices trigger health issues
Using mobile phones results in health complications

test_cases.base_claim: Climate change is caused by human activities

variations.text: Human activities are the cause of climate change
People's actions contribute to global warming
The climate transformation we observe stems from anthropogenic activities

test_cases.base_claim: The Great Wall is visible from space

variations.text: From space, the Great Wall can be seen
Astronauts can observe the Great Wall from orbit
Looking down from space makes the Great Wall visible
Mercury is an ingredient in vaccines
Immunizations are composed of mercury
The chemical composition of vaccines includes mercury

test_cases.base_claim: Evolution is a scientifically proven theory

variations.text: The theory of evolution has been scientifically proven
Scientific evidence supports the concept of evolution
Evolution represents a well-established and scientifically validated framework
Health is improved by regular physical activity
Consistent workout routines enhance wellbeing
Engaging in regular exercise contributes to better health outcomes
A sphere is the shape of the Earth
Our planet has a round form
It is well-established that the Earth takes on a spherical shape

test_cases.base_claim: Water freezes at zero degrees Celsius

variations.text: Zero degrees Celsius is the freezing point of water
Liquid water becomes solid at 0 degrees Celsius
The transformation of water from liquid to ice occurs at zero degrees Celsius
